overview: White sandy beaches, dreamy bays and turquoise blue lagoons - Halkidiki is also called the "Caribbean of Europe". The three fingers of the peninsula Kassandra, Sinthonia and Athos offer a lot of variety, the pulsating metropolis Thessaloniki is not far away and the hinterland is considered the green garden of Greece and a good hiking area.
title: Chalkidiki – Griechenlands göttliche Halbinsel
